price: 66. Tada žinios apie gerą atsakymą aptemdys juos tą dieną, ir jie nesugebės vienas kito paklausti.
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
